name: Lucenzo
description: '''Luís Filipe Fraga Oliveira''' ({{IPA|pt-PT|luˈiʃ fɨˈlipɨ ˈfɾaɣɐ ɔliˈvɐjɾɐ}}; born 27 May 1983), better known by his stage name '''Lucenzo''' ({{IPA|pt|luˈsẽzu|pron}}), is a Portuguese-French [[reggaeton]] singer, songwriter, rapper and record producer. He has been signed with the [[Universal Music Group|Universal Music]] record label for most of his career, and is best known for his dance hit with rapper [[Big Ali]], "[[Vem Dançar Kuduro|Vem dançar Kuduro]]". Puerto Rican [[reggaeton]] artist [[Don Omar]] released a Spanish/Portuguese version of the song under the title "[[Danza Kuduro]]" with Lucenzo.
